/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with lush green trees, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze, casting dappled shadows on the red brick buildings that flank the road. These buildings, with their traditional Chinese architectural style, add a touch of historical charm to the scene. In the distance, modern skyscrapers rise against the sky, representing the blend of old and new that characterizes Beijing. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with a few wispy clouds, adding to the overall tranquility of the scene.
